Package org.deuce.transaction.tl2cm.cm

Interface Summary
ContentionManager This interface describes a Contention Manager object.
 

Class Summary
AbstractContentionManager  
Aggressive Aggressive contention manager.
BackoffCM Abstract class for all contention managers that perform back-off.
BackoffCM.BackoffData This class stores all the data required to achieve back-off for a particular thread
Karma The Karma contention manager resolves conflicts by comparing the priorities of the conflicting threads.
KarmaLockStealer The Karma contention manager resolves conflicts by comparing the priorities of the conflicting threads.
LockSkipper  
Polite The Polite contention manager resolves conflicts by backing off and retrying the lock.
Polka The Polka contention manager combines the back-off capabilities of Polite and the priority-based resolution algorithm of Karma.
Suicide The Suicide contention manager always aborts the transaction of the current thread.
Timestamp  
 

Enum Summary
ContentionManager.Action Action to be taken by the thread calling a contention manager
